metadata.title: CVE-2021-45927 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: MDB Tools (aka mdbtools) 0.9.2 has a stack-based buffer overflow (at0x7ffd6e029ee0) in mdb_numeric_to_string (called from mdb_xfer_bound_dataand _mdb_attempt_bind).

criterions.comment: mdbtools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
